perturbation.original_text: As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows: F. "Licensed Products" shall mean BlackMP Living Water, BlackMP Concentrate, Zezel Probiotic Water, Zayin Sports Water, Gridiron CBD H2O Probiotics™ Water, Gridiron MVP™ and Gridiron MVP™ Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other products of the Company may be added to the list of Licensed Products during the Contract Period by written amendment to this Agreement. All amendments to this Agreement must be signed by all parties to this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: As used in this Agreement, the following terms shall be defined as follows: F. "Licensed Products" shall initially mean BlackMP Living Water and BlackMP Concentrate using the Pro Football Legends Logo on the Licensed Products' affixed labels, hang-tags or packaging. Other potential company offerings may be considered 'Affiliated Merchandise' and may be added to the list of Licensed Products or Affiliated Merchandise during the Contract Period at the sole discretion of the Company. All additions to this Agreement may be implemented at the Company's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly defines 'Licensed Products' and requires a written amendment signed by all parties for any additions. The modified text introduces 'Affiliated Merchandise,' makes the addition of products discretionary to the Company, and removes the requirement for all parties' signatures. This creates ambiguity and contradiction regarding what constitutes a 'Licensed Product' and how it can be added, favoring the Company's interpretation.

perturbation.original_text: A *donation of $0.05 per Unit sold of Licensed Products within the Contract Territory payable to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Donated amounts will be allocated and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter beginning on the first full quarter [three (3) month period] of the Agreement and continue on a quarterly basis thereafter for the term of this Agreement. Where the following per Unit conversion shall apply for the term of this Agreement: a. (1) Bottle of BlackMP LivingWater = 1 Unit b. (1) 4oz bottle of BlackMPConcentrate = 30 Units c. (1) Bottle of Zezel ProbioticWater = 1 Unit d. (1) Bottle of Zayin Sports Water = 1 Unit e. (1) Bottle Gridiron MVP™ Water= 1 Unit f. (1) Bottle Gridiron CBD H20 Probiotics™ Water = 1 Unit g. (1) 4oz bottle of Gridiron MVP™Concentrate = 30 Units _____________ * The NFLA-NC will donate 15% of the above described proceeds to the NFLA. ** The Company will provide to the NFLA-NC upon request the most recent quarterly sales report of the Company's Licensed Products.
perturbation.changed_text: A *charitable contribution, at the Company's discretion, based on a percentage of net profits (if any) from the sale of Branded Items within the territory, may be offered to the **NFL Alumni Northern California Chapter. Any potential allocations will be determined and dispersed to the Northern California Chapter, subject to the Company's sole discretion, at intervals decided by the Company. The Company will provide a summary of relevant sales data upon request, as deemed necessary by the company.
perturbation.explanation: The original text commits to a 'donation' of $0.05 per unit sold of 'Licensed Products,' payable quarterly. The revised text changes 'donation' to a discretionary 'charitable contribution' based on a percentage of 'net profits' from 'Branded Items', with the timing and amount at the Company's discretion. It also modifies the reporting obligation, making the sales data summary dependent on the Company's necessity, rather than being automatic.

perturbation.original_text: The parties have executed this Agreement on November 22nd, 2017. Food For Athletes, Inc. / Gridiron BioNutrients™ By: /s/ Darren Long Darren Long - CEO The National Football League Alumni, Inc. By: /s/ Elvis Gooden Elvis Gooden - President NFL Alumni - Northern California Chapter By: /s/ Eric Price Eric Price - President Endorsement Agreement Addendum I Page 2 of 2 Source: GRIDIRON BIONUTRIENTS, INC., 8-K, 12/6/2017
perturbation.changed_text: The parties have indicated their initial acceptance of this arrangement. This understanding does not constitute a legally binding agreement until further formalized through separate documentation. Food For Athletes, Inc. / Gridiron BioNutrients™ By: /s/ Darren Long Darren Long - Chief Executive Officer The National Football League Alumni, Inc. By: /s/ Elvis Gooden Elvis Gooden - President NFL Alumni - Northern California Chapter By: /s/ Eric Price Eric Price - President
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that 'the parties have executed this Agreement,' clearly indicating a binding contract. The modified text claims that the agreement is 'not a legally binding agreement until further formalized', which directly contradicts the original intention of execution. This creates uncertainty about the legal enforceability of the document despite signatures.
